scripts.postinstall: patch-package --silent || true && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='node_modules/@zackmans/baileys/lib/index.js';if(fs.existsSync(p)){let t=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');let lines=t.split(/\\r?\\n/).filter(l=>!(l.includes('Modified Baileys')||l.includes('modified Baileys')||l.includes('@zckmans')||l.includes('thank you for using my modified Baileys')||l.includes('------------------------------')||l.includes('import chalk')));fs.writeFileSync(p,lines.join('\\n'),'utf8');}"
